ai-ja354:1.2_0: and all the times left behind.
ai-ja354:1.3_0: In this way the body is extinguished,
ai-ja354:2.1_0: He doesn’t know the word of play,
ai-ja354:2.3_0: That’s why I do not grieve
ai-ja354:3.3_0: As he came, so he went:
ai-ja354:4.1_0: He doesn’t know the word of play,
ai-ja354:4.3_0: That’s why I do not grieve
ai-ja354:5.3_0: I shall be the family of relatives,
ai-ja354:6.1_0: He doesn’t know the word of play,
ai-ja354:6.3_0: That’s why I do not grieve
ai-ja354:8.1_0: He doesn’t know the word of play,
ai-ja354:8.3_0: That’s why I do not grieve
ai-ja354:10.1_0: He doesn’t know the word of play,
ai-ja354:10.3_0: That’s why I do not grieve
ai-ja354:11.1_0: on the fourth part of the body.
